name: Portrait of the Artist as Alien Transmission
description:
"Portrait of the Artist as Alien Transmission" refers to the artist as a form of pure intuition channeling signals from the Distant Outside. 

Picking up these signals is no small feat because the artist is concurrently processing the data in realtime and transforming it into a unique stylistic frequency, one that they unconsciously train themselves to transmit back into the universe while making their brief appearance on Planet Earth.

But where do these alien transmissions really come from and what happens to the artist as they process the simultaneous data of the actual sensory situation? Do they too then become a kind of hybrid form of alien communication?

As Sun Ra once said: “Everything comes from outer space...from unknown regions. Human life depends upon the unknown...knowledge is laughable when attributed to a human being.” 

The source material for this video portrait was originally captured by the artist in the Australian Outback, Hong Kong and Tokyo and remixed into various live A/V performances while touring internationally as Professor VJ.

24-second video loop with sounds by Chad Mossholder.
